changeSet.author: vpawar
changeSet.id: Setting specifying how containers positions of a given type are labeled

changeSet.author: vpawar
changeSet.createView: select c.identifier as container_identifier, c.name as container_name, p.identifier as position_identifier, p.pos_one_str, p.pos_two_str, case when c.pos_labeling_mode = 'LINEAR' then concat('', (p.pos_two - 1) * c.no_of_cols + p.pos_one) else concat(p.pos_two_str, concat(', ', p.pos_one_str)) end as formatted_position, p.occupying_specimen_id as specimen_id from os_storage_containers c inner join os_container_positions p on p.storage_container_id = c.identifier where c.activity_status != 'Disabled' and p.occupying_specimen_id is not null

changeSet.author: vpawar
changeSet.id: Track approx. freezer capacity which can be used for computing utilisation

changeSet.author: vpawar
changeSet.sql: update os_storage_containers cu inner join ( select t.freezer_id as freezer_id, round(exp(sum(log(a.no_of_rows * a.no_of_cols)))) as capacity from os_storage_containers a inner join os_containers_hierarchy h on h.ancestor_id = a.identifier inner join ( select f.identifier as freezer_id, min(b.identifier) as box_id from os_storage_containers f inner join os_containers_hierarchy h on h.ancestor_id = f.identifier inner join os_storage_containers b on b.identifier = h.descendent_id where f.parent_container_id is null and f.activity_status != 'Disabled' and b.store_specimens = 1 and b.activity_status != 'Disabled' group by f.identifier ) t on t.box_id = h.descendent_id group by t.freezer_id ) c_capacity on cu.identifier = c_capacity.freezer_id set cu.capacity = c_capacity.capacity

changeSet.author: vpawar
changeSet.sql: merge into os_storage_containers cu using ( select t.freezer_id as freezer_id, round(exp(sum(ln(a.no_of_rows * a.no_of_cols)))) as capacity from os_storage_containers a inner join os_containers_hierarchy h on h.ancestor_id = a.identifier inner join ( select f.identifier as freezer_id, min(b.identifier) as box_id from os_storage_containers f inner join os_containers_hierarchy h on h.ancestor_id = f.identifier inner join os_storage_containers b on b.identifier = h.descendent_id where f.parent_container_id is null and f.activity_status != 'Disabled' and b.store_specimens = 1 and b.activity_status != 'Disabled' group by f.identifier ) t on t.box_id = h.descendent_id group by t.freezer_id ) c_capacity on (cu.identifier = c_capacity.freezer_id) when matched then update set cu.capacity = c_capacity.capacity
